bug.author: luiscruz
bug.summary: Docs mention inexistent "Share app" menu item
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
"Tutorial: Create a data explorer app" includes a step to share a static version of the app:
That’s it, you’ve made it to the end. The last thing to do is share your findings. Locate the hamburger menu in the upper-right corner of the app and select Share app.
The aforementioned feature is not in the menu though. <denchmark-h:h1>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://streamlit.io/docs/tutorial/create_a_data_explorer_app.html#share-the-app>https://streamlit.io/docs/tutorial/create_a_data_explorer_app.html#share-the-app</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Expected behavior:</denchmark-h>
I expect to find a "Share app" item in the hamburger menu <denchmark-h:h2>Actual behavior:</denchmark-h>
No "Share app" feature can be found in the hamburger menu. Nor elsewhere <denchmark-h:h2>Is this a regression?</denchmark-h>
I think so. <denchmark-h:h1>Debug info</denchmark-h>
Streamlit version: 0.47 Python version: 3 Using Conda? PipEnv? PyEnv? Pex? No OS version: 10.14.6 Browser version: Safari 12.1.2
<denchmark-h:h1>Additional information</denchmark-h>
Either add the "share app" feature (please!) or remove it from the tutorial (I can do this if you want).

comments.comment: Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/luiscruz>@luiscruz</denchmark-link> ! Can you make a PR to remove sharing from the tutorial? As you know, we'll re-add that feature soon, but in terms of documentation we need to write up a more complete explanation, mentioning what to put in each field in the config params, and so on. So for now it's best to just remove it.
Yes, I'll take care of it <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tvst>@tvst</denchmark-link>
